definitions.definition: a person who buys and sells goods, currency, or stocks.
examples: dealer, merchant, buyer, seller, buyer and seller, marketeer, merchandiser, broker, agent; Moredistributor, vendor, purveyor, monger, supplier, trafficker; retailer, wholesaler; storekeeper, shopkeeper; wheeler-dealer "a commodities trader"Moredistributor, vendor, purveyor, monger, supplier, trafficker; retailer, wholesaler; storekeeper, shopkeeper; wheeler-dealer a commodities trader
